who is Sara Hanson?
creative. fearless. visionary.
I am a XR developer and sophomore at the University of Southern California, majoring in Computer Science Games.
creative. When I am not coding, I am avidly listening to music, DJing, practicing yoga, reading Eve Babitz, playing on the Oculus GO, or daydreaming.
fearless. I left my decade-long home in Omaha, NE and moved to Nashville, TN in the middle of high school. I applied to USC Computer Science with no CS experience. I created a production-level website with no prior experience. I built a CNN to recognize human activity in 2 weeks with no prior experience. I am not afraid of a challenge.
visionary. I strive to bring my daydreams to life through XR and Graphic Design. By pursuing a Computer Science Games degree, conducting cutting edge VR research, and building unique XR applications, I am actively influencing the XR world and developing the tools to be a major player in the realm.
